ðŸ“– Summary: The Blitzkrieg 2 repository contains the source code and assets for the 2005 real-time tactics game, Blitzkrieg 2. Released under a non-commercial license, it allows the community to explore, learn from, and modify the game's engine and content. The repository includes the complete game data, design documents, source code, and development tools.
